Package KI304.Moh

Class Sea

java.lang.Object
KI304.Moh.Reservoir
KI304.Moh.Sea
All Implemented Interfaces:
Fishing
public class Sea extends Reservoir implements Fishing
The Sea class represents a sea, extending the Reservoir class and implementing the Fishing interface. It includes additional properties specific to a sea, such as the number of sharks and fishing allowances.
Since:
2023-11-25

  • Constructor Details

    • Sea

      public Sea()
      Default constructor for the Sea class.

    • Sea

      public Sea(String name, int amountOfWater, int waterTemperature, int numberOfSharks)
      Parameterized constructor for the Sea class. Initializes the sea with specified properties and checks fishing allowances.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the sea.
      amountOfWater - The amount of water in the sea.
      waterTemperature - The temperature of the water in the sea.
      numberOfSharks - The initial number of sharks in the sea.

  • Method Details

    • showInfo

      public void showInfo()
      Displays information about the sea, including its name, amount of water, water temperature, number of sharks, current season, and fishing allowances.
      Specified by:
      showInfo in class Reservoir

    • winterIsComing

      public void winterIsComing()
      Sets the properties of the sea for the winter. Logs the change and displays information about the sea.
      Specified by:
      winterIsComing in class Reservoir

    • springIsComing

      public void springIsComing()
      Sets the properties of the sea for the spring. Logs the change, adjusts the amount of water, and displays information about the sea.
      Specified by:
      springIsComing in class Reservoir

    • summerIsComing

      public void summerIsComing()
      Sets the properties of the sea for the summer. Logs the change, adjusts the amount of water, and displays information about the sea. If the amount of water is less than 500000, the sea dries up.
      Specified by:
      summerIsComing in class Reservoir

    • autumnIsComing

      public void autumnIsComing()
      Sets the properties of the sea for the autumn. Logs the change and displays information about the sea.
      Specified by:
      autumnIsComing in class Reservoir

    • fish

      public void fish()
      Performs the action of fishing in the sea. If shark fishing is allowed, reduces the number of sharks, checks if further fishing is allowed, and logs the result.
      Specified by:
      fish in interface Fishing

    • feed

      public void feed()
      Performs the action of feeding in the sea. Increases the number of sharks, checks if fishing is allowed, and logs the result.
      Specified by:
      feed in interface Fishing

    • isFishingAllowed

      public void isFishingAllowed()
      Checks whether fishing is currently allowed in the sea. Updates the fishing allowance flag based on the number of sharks.
      Specified by:
      isFishingAllowed in interface Fishing
